item.title: TGTX
item.description: score:116 Chances: TG Therapeutics, Inc. is scheduled to present at the 42nd Annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference, indicating potential positive developments and investor interest The average price targets set by Wall Street analysts indicate a potential upside of 127.8%, which may attract more investors.

item.title: IMGN
item.description: score:29 Chances: ImmunoGen has recently been upgraded to a Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy), indicating growing optimism about its earnings prospects. The company’s pipeline includes promising candidates such as Mirvetuximab Soravtansine, IMGN632, IMGC936, and IMGN151, which bodes well for its future growth potential.
